long_description: The girls' Marmot Ether Hoodie Jacket provides an ultralight, wind-resistant, water-repellent and breathable layer, equipping kids to stay comfortable in rapidly changing weather. Polyester shell shrugs off wind and light precipitation while allowing body vapor to escape; underarm vents further enhance breathability. DriClime(R) lining wicks moisture away from the skin to help keep kids cool and dry. Non-binding Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves preserve full range of motion. The Marmot Ether Hoodie Jacket features a zippered chest pocket, elastic cuffs and a roll-up hood.
short_description: The girls' Marmot Ether Hoodie Jacket provides an ultralight, wind-resistant, water-repellent and breathable layer, equipping kids to stay comfortable in rapidly changing weather.
